body_html:
Thanks @drpngx. The current behavior of this PR is to show a warning in doc string (from the annotation @deprecated_args), and accept either keep_dims or keepdims in the call.

Both keep_dims or keepdims should work.

However, in case both keep_dims and keepdims are specified in the same call, then an error will be thrown.
body_text:
Thanks @drpngx. The current behavior of this PR is to show a warning in doc string (from the annotation @deprecated_args), and accept either keep_dims or keepdims in the call.
Both keep_dims or keepdims should work.
However, in case both keep_dims and keepdims are specified in the same call, then an error will be thrown.
body:
Thanks @drpngx. The current behavior of this PR is to show a warning in doc string (from the annotation `@deprecated_args`), and accept either `keep_dims` or `keepdims` in the call.

Both `keep_dims` or `keepdims` should work.

However, in case both `keep_dims` and `keepdims` are specified in the same call, then an error will be thrown.
